recommendations.title: Build Immediate Emergency Fund to Prevent Further Debt Accumulation
recommendations.description: Given the high-interest rates and significant unpaid amounts, creating an emergency fund will help prevent further debt accumulation. Focus on saving 6-8 months of living expenses in a high-yield savings account. This will help create a safety net for unexpected expenses, enabling more aggressive debt repayment.

recommendations.title: Aggressively Pay Off High-Interest Debts Through the Avalanche Method
recommendations.description: Focus on paying off the highest-interest debt first to eliminate interest charges quickly. For the individual, this means prioritizing the HDFC Credit Card with a 42% interest rate. Make minimum payments on other debts and channel extra funds towards the credit card balance.

recommendations.title: Target High-Interest Personal Loan Next for Aggressive Debt Repayment
recommendations.description: Following the payoff of the HDFC Credit Card, focus on the Personal Loan - Wedding with a 14.5% interest rate. Apply the avalanche method to eliminate this debt quickly, making minimum payments on other debts and channeling extra funds towards the personal loan balance.
